summary: This document appears to be a client relationship agreement and margin agreement from UBS, acknowledging the terms and conditions for managing accounts. It includes details about margin calls, account types, and electronic delivery consent for account-related documents. The document also references financial advisors involved in the account management.

persons.name: Scott Stedman
persons.context: Scott Stedman is mentioned as a financial advisor responsible for sending agreements and disclosures electronically to clients.

persons.name: Lyle Casdel
persons.context: Lyle Casdel is mentioned alongside Scott Stedman as a financial advisor involved in the account management.

keyFacts: The document is a client relationship agreement and margin agreement from UBS.
It includes terms regarding margin calls and the management of securities in client accounts.
Scott Stedman and Lyle Casdel are identified as financial advisors associated with the accounts.
The document mentions electronic delivery of agreements and disclosures to clients.
There is a pre-dispute arbitration clause included in the agreement.
